snippet: Jimmy Kimmel saw his viewership drop to 2.86 million viewers from 3.09 million on Tuesday night, meaning he finished third in viewers on his second night airing at 11:35, behind Jay Leno and David Letterman.
abstract: Jimmy Kimmel saw his viewership drop to 2.86 million viewers from 3.09 million on Tuesday night, meaning he finished third in viewers on his second night airing at 11:35, behind Jay Leno and David Letterman.

headline.main: On Second Night in New Slot, a Ratings Slide for Kimmel
